The Senior Business Analyst provides oversight to Maintenance Programs to ensure regulatory compliance, mitigate risk, and increase effectiveness. Perform surveillance, oversight, and auditing functions for existing and proposed Maintenance program processes by identifying deficiencies, implementing corrective measures, and recommending improvements to ensure FAA regulatory and Company compliance, increasing operational efficiency, and mitigating risk
Advise Leadership on program processes by reviewing Maintenance Procedural Manuals and/or standard practices, investigating undocumented procedures, meeting with subject matter experts, and compiling various sources of information in order to identify gaps, inconsistencies, and areas for improvement
